text: The Rev. Theodore Martin Hesburgh, CSC, STD (May 25, 1917 - February 26, 2015) is an American priest of the Congregation of Holy Cross.Michael O'Brien, Hesburgh: A Biography (1998); Theodore M. Hesburgh, God, Country, Notre Dame: The Autobiography of Theodore M. Hesburgh (2000) He is also the President Emeritus of the University of Notre Dame. He is the namesake for TIAA-CREF's Hesburgh Award. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography from the University of Notre Dame * Category:1917 births Category:Academics from Syracuse, New York Category:American Roman Catholic priests Category:2015 deaths
title: Theodore Hesburgh
